QuestData.Title: The Art of Taming
QuestData.Description:
Quite the surprise to find this beast so hale and hearty. It seems to have taken a liking to you.
If you're ever going to be as great as one of the Dawntrackers, you must learn how to handle multiple pets.
Allow me to show you how.
QuestData.LogDescription: Learn how to dismiss, tame, and stable pets from Mithran Dawntracker.
QuestData.RewardText:
I don't believe there is anything left to teach you, $n.
Now you must go forth and find more beasts to tame and call your own.
If you ever need to store or retrieve your pets, speak with me or any other stable masters you encounter in your travels.

Objectives.Objective: Use "Dismiss Pet" to temporarily dismiss your current pet
Speak with Mithdran to summon and tame your new pet
Speak with Mithdran to learn about pet stables
